1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: The perfect family gathers for a dinner - Mika, her husband Tony, their children Dara, Lia and Bogdan, Mika's ex - Number 1 and his girlfriend. Absent is only Tony's mother Felina, who's in a clinic recovering from her alcohol addiction. While frustrated by her flourishing secret love, Dara observes the other family members, whose love lives are way ahead into hurricanes of uncertainties - external and internal. The first flaw in the relations of Mika and Tony begins in an innocent way. The anniversary dinner of Mika's associate - Irina is spoiled by the discovery of ...

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Dara enrolls in drama classes at school in order to be able to spend time with her secret love - Bobby. Betrayed by her boyfriend, Lia finds comfort into the arms of an older TV producer. Felina escapes from the clinic and gets into a sex affair. Tony is completely obsessed by Jasmina. That's why he gets at odds with his wife more and more frequently. Yet, she decides to organize a surprise party for his birthday. And while he comes and goes in order to spend some time with Jasmina, Mika meets the enigmatic Alexander Panov.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Tony and Jasmina get into a love affair. She believes that he's divorced. Meanwhile Lia's relationship with the TV producer gets serious, but it's not easy for his friends to accept her. Dara's feminine self-esteem evaporates at the drama classes. Felina is also disappointed by the intimate opportunities that are available around her. Mika hires the sexually provocative Silvia as her assistant. Coincidentally Silvia sets a meeting with a surprising prospect client. Mika finds evidence of another woman in Tony's car and leaves him.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Lia leaves home to move to the TV producer's place. Tony's new client - Panov wants to makeup with his girlfriend. He offers Tony a large amount of money in exchange for his help. At the same time Panov offers Mika more than a business. A funny accident brings Tony and Number 1 in the police department, together with two minors in an accusation of drug abuse. Mika tries to bail them.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Tony wants to spend time with Jasmina by taking her on a romantic trip but ends up there with another woman. At the same time, Dara and Felina welcome to a home party Bobby and a bunch of friends from the drama classes. Lia goes back home and gets involved in her sister's party. At a therapy session Panov introduces to Tony the woman, whose attention he was trying to regain.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Jasmina is stunned by the disclosure that Tony is married. He's also surprised to know that she's involved with another man. Mika encounters a new challenge - to bring her husband back into their bed. She attends a famous fortune-teller, who gives her recipe for a love magic. Dara's drama classes are suspended and Felina volunteers to conduct them. Tony finds out that Mika works for Panov and tries to sabotage their cooperation.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Tony is summoned as an expert on criminal proceedings, where he realizes that Panov is a notorious underground boss. Mika is preparing a project for Panov, but she entirely declines his amorous attacks. She is doing her best to inflame passion with her husband. Silvia shows Mika photos of Tony's car with a pair of red high-heeled boots sticking out of the side window. Mika initiates her own detective investigation during which she finds out devastating facts about her daughter Lia. While crying out the family problems before Number 1, she turns in bed with him. Mika's...

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Mika is fascinated by Jasmina's course and tries to practice the love advices in order to bring Tony back to herself. At the same time Jasmina wants to have a baby with Tony. Panov finds out about Jasmina and Tony's affair. He decides to blackmail him to work for his court case. Following Jasmina's sex advices Mika falls into Panov's instead of Tony's arms. She has not felt so genuinely feminine for a long time.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Under the pressure of a death threat Tony prepares Panov for court. He involves even Felina into this process. Everybody's love lives are flourishing only Tony is having hard times to get out of Jasmina's iron hug. He tries to confess his affair before his wife. At the same time Mika is totally attracted to Alexander Panov. Tony notices the change. Still, he can't admit that his conservative wife might have a love affair. Mika keeps attending Jasmina's course. They become very close friends. Jasmina confides that she has an affair with a married man. Accidentally ...

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Tony confesses before Mika the flirt with another woman and suggests to move out. Mika, who feels guilty too, forgives him. Tony and Jasmina break up. Dara's ready to lose her virginity. Lia's boyfriend leaves but this brings her unexpected luck. Mika and Tony have dinner with Number 1 and Irina. Number 1 spills the beans that he had sex with Mika recently. Tony races to Jasmina's place but ends up in the hospital. When Mika arrives and the ER she sees Jasmina, leaning over the unconscious Tony.

imdb.plot outline: LIAISONS is a modern dramedy, telling the story of the affairs and relations within a family and beyond; the ongoing search for love and the various ways of getting it today. The series follows the love life of one famous architect with impeccable reputation (Mika, 43), her husband - former coroner, and a marriage counselor now (Tony, 48), and their family. Its numerous members are being tingled in complicated affairs, which consistently add dirty secrets and embarrassing stains to the biography of the "perfect" family. The grounds are seriously endangered. Could Mika and Tony manage to stay together, or will they indulge to the temptations, which skulk from the outer world?
imdb.title: Liaisons
plot: LIAISONS is a modern dramedy, telling the story of the affairs and relations within a family and beyond; the ongoing search for love and the various ways of getting it today. The series follows the love life of one famous architect with impeccable reputation (Mika, 43), her husband - former coroner, and a marriage counselor now (Tony, 48), and their family. Its numerous members are being tingled in complicated affairs, which consistently add dirty secrets and embarrassing stains to the biography of the "perfect" family. The grounds are seriously endangered. Could Mika and Tony manage to stay together, or will they indulge to the temptations, which skulk from the outer world?::EMO Vision
synopsis:
Mika is known for her conservative nature, whereas her husband Tony perceives the world rather mellow. However, in the eyes of their friends the two of them are the perfect family couple.
Everything changes when the architect finds that her husband, the marriage counselor, has an affair. Mika is really shocked, but decides to keep her cards closed. She is forced to change her old fashioned view about marriage and enrolls in a course for geishas, taught by a popular sexologist, who becomes her friend.
The two of them become extremely close. Mika absorbs any advice related to the subject of how to get rid of the bitch. Up to the day when she finds out that her sex mentor is namely her husbands mistress.
Imminent danger is casting shadow over Tony too. He has violated the professional ethics. He has revoked the sexologist from a notorious underground boss after a series of consultations of the couple in his office. Tony is forced to find the balance between lies in the family and defense of his personal and professional life, if these secrets get revealed.
Following their common desire to return to each other, Mika and Tony form a quiet battlefield. There are no hostages in it, but there is no mercy either. In the process of her liberation Mika falls over her new client charismatic, temperamental and extremely jealous underground boss, whose house she is expected to furnish. Ironically, he occurs to be the sexologists ex-boyfriend and also a former client of Tony.
At the same time, the relations in Tonys love affair also become complicated. Tony is entrapped in the absurd situation to look for salvation from his mistress with his wife. But Mika is no longer sure that she can stay with him. Unless, if some extraordinary circumstances bond them back together. Like, for example, one very real corpse.
